title: Add GC Info to System Admin Page including % of uptime
description: This is just a patch for adding in a little bit of GC information to the system admin page. I mainly wanted to get a percentage of time spent of both GC collections by uptime.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Any clue how many entries there'll be here? There are already some pretty beefy jmx responses, I'm just wondering what the worst-case scenario is.
